name: solar-report-bot
description: Cloudflare Worker for automated daily solar data reports to Telegram

TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram bot token. Get it by messaging @BotFather on Telegram and using /newbot

TARGET_CHAT_ID.description: The Telegram group chat ID where solar reports will be posted (e.g., -1001415136439). Add your bot to the group first, then visit https://api.telegram.org/bot<YOUR_BOT_TOKEN>/getUpdates to find the chat.id

MASTER_ID.description: Your personal Telegram user ID for receiving error notifications. Get your ID by messaging @userinfobot on Telegram
